original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, system expertise, and stakeholder management skills. As a Configuration Specialist, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations that drive operational efficiency and accuracy. Your ability to understand diverse business needs, collaborate cross-functionally, and implement tailored technical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems effectively support the organization's goals.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into comprehensive configuration specifications for our core [mention specific system] platform
- Develop and maintain data mappings, integrations, and other technical configurations to support business processes
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate configuration changes
- Analyze existing system data to identify optimization opportunities, trends, and areas for improvement
- Recommend and implement configuration changes to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business needs and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to engage with diverse stakeholders and translate technical information into easily understandable terms
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools
- Thorough understanding of configuration management best practices and the ability to implement them effectively

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and a demonstrated ability to thrive in fast-paced, iterative environments
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration or similar complex product configuration processes

Required Experience:
- 3-5 years of experience in a configuration management, business analysis, or a similar role, with a proven track record of translating business requirements into technical solutions
- Hands-on experience with implementing and troubleshooting system configurations, integrations, and data mappings

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies, and the ability to leverage these tools to enhance configuration processes
- Prior experience working in a vehicle configuration or similar complex product environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Familiarity with database querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Experience with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Office)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Agile development methodology, requiring the ability to adapt to changing priorities and work in an iterative manner
- Strong focus on continuous improvement and the identification of optimization opportunities
- Willingness to provide on-call support and participate in after-hours troubleshooting as needed

Role Overview:
As a Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our core business systems accurately reflect and support the organization's evolving needs. This position requires a unique blend of technical expertise, analytical thinking, and stakeholder management skills. You will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations, driving operational efficiency and data integrity. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, identify optimization opportunities, and implement tailored solutions will be instrumental in the ongoing success of our technology ecosystem.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Analyze existing system data and configurations to identify areas for improvement, streamline processes, and enhance overall efficiency
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] platform, including data mappings, integrations, and other technical components
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate configuration changes and gather feedback
- Leverage machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to enhance configuration processes and identify optimization opportunities
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Collaborate with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless integration of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business needs and devise effective technical solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to engage with diverse stakeholders and translate technical information into easily understandable terms
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and the ability to thrive in fast-paced, iterative environments
- Understanding of configuration management best practices and the ability to implement them effectively

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies, and the ability to leverage these tools to enhance configuration processes
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration or similar complex product configuration processes

Required Experience:
- 3-5 years of experience in a configuration management, business analysis, or a similar role, with a proven track record of translating business requirements into technical solutions
- Hands-on experience with implementing and troubleshooting system configurations, integrations, and data mappings

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working in a vehicle configuration or similar complex product environment
- Exposure to Agile methodologies and a demonstrated ability to adapt to changing priorities and work in an iterative manner

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Familiarity with database querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Experience with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Office)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Strong focus on continuous improvement and the identification of optimization opportunities
- Willingness to provide on-call support and participate in after-hours troubleshooting as needed
- Ability to work effectively in an Agile development environment, adapting to changing priorities and working in an iterative manner
